nimiththa: athithaye sa/pela asamath kalawaradata karanawamiya pasal guruthuma marayi.-puwathak usas pela ta asamath kala waradata karagala gana babarayeku wuna karumeta ganna paliya guruthumani umbae bella 1 k adahas dakwala.:

ha oya "rud" eka kiwwama mathak une..ape me kathandara mahaththaya mata mathak kola hari wachane ''rud ''neweyi ''rut'' kiyana eka..bohoma isthuyi eekatath..eeth ithin ape wachana sat ekatanan ithin ''rud'' thamayi diwata huru...ee hinda kawurath amanapa wena ekak nahane huru widiyatama adagena giyata..hari.ee kathawata gehun..oya wagema thawa wachanayak mathak una aayibon..ee thamayi "sam mahaththaya" polosiye inna kaledi nitharama ahena wachanayak ooka..man hathara athe balanawa kawuda me sam mahaththaya kiyala.."gihin sam mahaththayata kiyanna..sam mahaththaya innawada..?sam mahaththaya katha kala"..ayiyo mala wikarayayi..mama ithin hoyanawa "sam mahaththayawa"...passene danne mun me sam sam kiyanne saj ehema naththan sajan mahaththaya kiyana ekata kiyala..kohoma hari dawas dekathunakma gehun thamayi mata "sam mahaththa"ya hambu une..hari ee kathawath paththakin thiyamuko...ithin mulinma man kiyannan ara kalin lipiye komentuwala kiyala thibuna wage..dura gaman sewawala bas ratha the bonna bath kanna kadawal wala nawaththuwama siddha wena wada piliwela...oya dura gaman gihin thiyena hugak dena dannawane api oya basrathawala yaddi..warin wara athara maga nawaththanawa the bonna..ethakota bath kanna..ee wagema ithin oya hira koragena sindu kathandara kime awashyathath ista siddha koraganta ahaki wena widiyata...ithin bohoma durata ohoma bas eka nawaththanne hamadamath purudu una kadayak gawama thamayi..ee kadawala udawiya unath dannawa ahawal welawata ahawal basrathaya methanata enawa kiyana karunawa..ee hinda nitharama ee aya sudanamin inne ee ee bas rathawalata thamunge sewawa sapayanna...oya wage bas nawaththana kada hama thanamath naha..ee wenuwenma wen wechcha kada ee kiyanne hotal adala marga ayine pihitala thiyenawa..ee wagema thamayi bas karayoth oya thiyena thiyena hama kadema nawaththanne naha..thamunta huru purudu..ee wagema hodin salakana hotal walata thamayi baseka allanne...ithin me wage dura sewa basratha thama thamunge kada gawa nawaththa ganna me hotal himiyan bohoma unanduyi..mokada ithin eka para siyak hamarak inna bas rathayak thamunge kade gawa nawaththuwama aduma gane ee bas eke inna aayingen bagayakwath bahala awilla the kahata ekak hari bonawane..kohomatath ee wage hotal walata baswala udawiya harunu kota wena paribhogikayin enawa aduyi..ithin kohoma hari wadi basratha pramanayak thamunge welada salata genwa ganna ee aya athare bohoma loku satanak thiyenne...ithin me thathwaya yatathe thamunge hotalaya asala nawathwana basrathawala riyadurata saha bas paluwata bohoma ihalin sangaraha sathkara korannata me aya waga bala gannawa...sama kadayakama anith ayata wadiya penne nathi thanaka podi kamarayak thiyenawa..lassanata mesayak dala putu hathara pahak thiyala hulan peththak ehema kittu korala...ee wagemayi ee kamare sewaya sadahama wishesha sewaka mahaththayek path korala thiyenawa..ee wagemayi ee wadeta yodawana sewakaya hotale mudalalita bohoma wishwasawantha kenek wenna oona kiyana karanawath..anika waradila hari ee sewakaya nathi welawata hotale ayithikarayama hari awilla ara kamare gana balanawa..anith sewakayinwa unath eekata yawanna wadiya kamathi naha..hethuwa thamayi..anith ayage sulu adupaduwak nisa ho ara bas aran ena riyaduru mahaththurange mal wage thiyena ahinsaka lapati hith rideyi kiyana baya...ayi ithin podi awulak hinda hari undala bas eka ethana nawaththanne nathiwa wena thanakata allanna purudu unoth..kiyak nan kiyala mudalalita paduda..?ee hinda harima garu salakili athuwa riyaduru mahathwaranta..bas palu mahaththurunta salakanna ee aya harima salakilimath...ithin kohoma hari api gehun bas eka nawaththala bas eken bahala kadeta goda weddima wage mudalalima tikak magata awith athin allagenama wage..yan yan athulata kiyala onna apiwa bara denawa ara thamunge wiswasawantha sewaka unnaheta..ethana idan oonna apith nikan dewiwara wage...bath kanawanan..baththe bonawanan the..oona deyak..oya dura gaman baswalin mata hura wechcha jara puruddak thibuna ee kale...ee thamayi kama kana gaman koka kola bona eka..ayi ithin nikan dena ekane...athin payin yana ekakya...ithin wadi wechcha hatiyema apita oona monawada kiyala ahala ee dewal kisi aduwak nathiwa sapayanawa..api hithamuko bath kanawa kiyala...dum dama dama bath palagan ekka hodama mas malu wanjana meseta puronawa..wisheshayenma hotalaye thiyena masak maluwakata wadi deyak aniwaryayen thiyenawa...hugak durata muwa mas gona mas ehemath ooya meseta ena awastha wadiyi..me okkotamath kalin himita kanata karala ahana wakkiyakuth thiyenawa.."mukuth karanawada..?"uththare.."naha"nan..."hiniyatawath"eeth uththare "mhu..epa.."

mita wada kiyanna deyak naha...ithiri tika kiyana eka umbaata barayi.balawath hathuranta wada moda mithuran thama ha ekathuwa an aya ha wada karannata yama umbaatath wipathak wennata puluwan hinda man sadde wahala innan..eeth hamadamath umbaath ekka math innawa...
nawakatha, ketikatha, kawi, sithuwam shilpaya wani anekuth minis santhanayan pramodayata pathkarawana sulu sanniwedana kala madhyayange gunathmaka bawath apa wetha pasak karanne eyayi.
ihatha roga lakshana we nam rudhiraye sini mattama waidya upades matha pariksha karagatha yuthuya.
